label18: With sensor and its ability to capture faster frame rates, even fast-moving subjects are captured and reproduced in outstanding detail
label19: Videos can now also be saved in the Internet-friendly MP4 format and can be uploaded directly to social media or mobile devices, for example, without the need for conversion
label13: With electronic viewfinder, photographers can now perfectly assess image framing and exposure settings, even in brightly lit situations
label10: With its constant maximum aperture of f/2.8 throughout the entire zoom range, the Leica DC Vario-Elmarit 4.5?108 mm f/2.8 ASPH. guarantees pin- sharp images even at high ISO settings and considerable distances
label11: In addition to this, its 12-megapixel CMOS image sensor ensures outstanding still-picture and video quality with a high dynamic range and natural, perfectly saturated colours
label17: The V-Lux 4 captures full-HD video in AVCHD format with 1920 × 1080 pixels and 60 full frames per second
label14: The viewfinder has an impressively high resolution of 1.3 megapixels, shows 100% of the image frame and displays exactly the same exposure setting information as the camera's monitor screen
label15: With magnification function, users can zoom in on details of their subjects, while a dioptre compensation setting makes it ideal for use by spectacle wearers
exposuremodes: Automatic programme (P), automatic aperture priority (A), automatic shutter priority (S), manual setting (M)
whitebalancemodes: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Incandescent, Manual, Shade
label9: High-performance 24× super-tele-zoom lens of the Leica V-Lux 4 has an enormous range of focal lengths ranging from 25 to 600 mm (35 mm equivalent)
label4: Fast (f/2.8) lens enables sharp pictures even in poor light and throughout the entire zoom range of 25 to 600 mm (equivalent in 35 mm format)
label5: With electronic viewfinder, photographers now also always have a perfect view of their subjects, even in bright surroundings
label6: The rotatable three-inch LCD monitor screen allows effortless composition of shots from even the most unusual angles
label7: At the same time, it also features fast continuous-shooting capability and masters full-HD video recording at up to 60 frames per second
lens: Leica DC Vario-Elmar 4.5 -108 mm f/2.8 ASPH. (equivalent to 25 - 600 mm in 35 mm format), 14 elements in 11 groups (5 aspherical lenses, 9 aspherical surfaces)
scenemodes: Portrait, Soft skin, Self-portrait, Scenery, Panorama assist, Sports, Night portrait, Night scenery, HDR, Food, Baby 1, Baby 2, Pet, Sunset, 3D Photo
label20: An integrated stereo microphone with a built-in wind-noise filter ensures outstanding audio quality

label24: At a reduced resolution of 2.5 megapixels, it records at a fantastic 60 frames per second. Users can capture every action and important moment, even when shooting sports or wildlife
